title: Patch 5.6 Mega Thread
body:
Summoners,

If you have any bugs or issues you would like to notify us about, please log them here and we will work together to try and resolve them for you.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: Hi! I am unable to launch at all. Redownloaded client and everything too. Cheers
Hi ToxicHawk i cant update my patch even i can download everything else doe
There is a bug with rabadons deathcap, it isn't applying the bonus AP from its passive

I'll test this in a custom in a second, i believe it is applying the bonus AP just not showing it in the tool tip

EDIT: Definitely giving the bonus AP, did a CS test for myself (76 at 13 minutes i suck at csing on anivia) and when i got to raba's with no runes/masteries and no other items i had 156 AP

I keep getting the Connection failure windows. 

It successfully goes past the connecting to the server windows but once the logging on pops up, it stuck there until the Connection failure pops up.

Not sure whether  it is an issue related to my account or connection or it is on riot's end.

Nothing for me yet, I just wanted to point out the new teemo skin.
1- he already has like 2 legendary skins doesn't he?
-Why not make it an Ultimate skin
2- His mushrooms should be landmines, considering he is going for that Modern warfare feel.
3- It does look and sound good regardless. Just wanted to throw some ideas out.

Because Teemo is *THAT* champion. 
People either love him or love to hate him. 
Indirectly is makes both parties happy :P.
